trans-unit.source: You have more than one shop and must select one to configure payment.
trans-unit.target: Karena Anda memiliki lebih dari satu toko, Anda harus memilih salah satunya untuk melakukan konfigurasi pembayaran.

trans-unit.source: No currency mode for payment module
trans-unit.target: Mata uang di modul payment belum diset.

trans-unit.source: Cart cannot be loaded or an order has already been placed using this cart
trans-unit.target: Cart cannot be loaded or an order has already been placed using this cart

trans-unit.source: The cart rule named "%1s" (ID %2s) used in this cart is not valid and has been withdrawn from cart
trans-unit.target: Aturan troli bernama "%1s" (ID %2s) yang digunakan di troli ini tidak sah dan telah ditarik dari troli

trans-unit.source: Warning: the secure key is empty, check your payment account before validation
trans-unit.target: Peringatan: kunci pengaman kosong, cek akun pembayaran Anda sebelum melakukan validasi.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while saving message
We recommend providing at least two different payment methods. Only one payment method could be problematic if this option cannot be used by a customer because it will prevent him/her from ordering.
trans-unit.target: Kami rekomendasikan untuk menambahkan setidaknya dua metode pembayaran. Satu metode pembayaran, jika bermasalah, akan menghambat proses belanja pelanggan.
Tidak ada modul pembayaran yang diinstal
